name: In the Dark (itch) (Pergaeyon)
description:
Description

« In the Dark » is a mod for Hexen (initially released in 1995) and running on the original Doom engine. It was created as a level design project related to "Interactive Digital Experience" Gobelins/CNAM-ENJMIN education.
It features a rather dark level adding a RPG twist to the original FPS experience, and an environmental maze shaped as a giant spiderweb.

Useful tips
  • The game uses an inventory system, as well as dialogues interactions. Do not forget to cuztomize the ingame controls according to your preferences (as default ones can be a bit clunky)
  • If the game is literally too dark, you can brighten it by raising the gamma in the options
  • The difficulty curve can be steep, do no hesitate to lower the skill level at the beginning to fully enjoy
